dcterms:creator: L. Rüttimann
J. Rychen
T. Tomka
H. Hörster
M. D. Rocha
R. H. Hahnloser
dcterms:description: The bird vocalization dataset TwoRadioBirds contains accelerometer and microphone recordings of an adult male and an adult female zebra finch (Taeniopygia guttata) that were housed in a homecage where they could freely behave. The dataset consists of eleven data files of 1 hr. duration each, out of which three are densely annotated and eight are unlabelled. Each file contains data from a microphone (audio) and two accelerometers (body vibration) channels, sampled at a rate of 24000 Hz.
dcterms:title: TwoRadioBirds

dcterms:creator: C. Lorenz
X. Hao
T. Tomka
L. Rüttimann
R. H. Hahnloser
dcterms:description: Candidate vocalizations were extracted from the TwoRadioBirds dataset as described in the referenced paper. The extraction process involved visual inspection of accelerometer vibration spectrograms and manual correction of vocalization onsets and offsets.
dcterms:title: Candidate vocalizations
